analysis.key_quote: The proposed creation of Schedule P/C (formerly Schedule F) is an attempt to classify as many employees as possible as at will employees who can be gotten rid of every 4/8 years when an administration changes.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about undermining civil service protections and the potential for politicization of federal employment, indicating a strong defense of the merit-based system and due process rights for employees.
